headline: The only thing to fear is not using Photoshop.
quote: The only thing to fear is fear itself.

headline: You miss 100% of the edits you don’t Photoshop.
quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

headline: The Photoshop pro catches the opportunity.
quote: The early bird catches the worm.

headline: The only thing to fear is missing out on Photoshop.
quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

headline: Celebrating isn’t everything, but wanting to Coca-Cola is.
quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
